thread.title: Stacy Braun
thread.title_full: Peaches Boutique reviewed by Stacy Braun

author: Stacy Braun
title: Stacy Braun
text: We arrived at 12:05 on a Friday, the store had only been open for five minutes, we were ticket number 55. We had to wait almost two hours for a dressing room but every single person that works there was exceptionally nice. The moms were fun to talk to while we stood and watched all the girls try dresses on. Our 2 hours flew by. The owner, I believe, was very hands on and even made a special phone call for us looking for a specific dress my daughter wanted. We couldn't get it but she had a few other ones she liked. Overall This was a 5 Star experience. Thoughtful, organized and FUN!!
